subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Arizona Coach Bruce Arians said Carson Palmer, who is returning from a left knee injury that cut short his season last year, would play one series Saturday in the team’s first preseason game, against visiting Kansas City.
snippet: Arizona Coach Bruce Arians said Carson Palmer, who is returning from a left knee injury that cut short his season last year, would play one series Saturday in the team’s first preseason game, against visiting Kansas City.
